quote: A Russia that gradually begins to gravitate toward the West will also be a Russia that ceases to disrupt the international system.

But since real social change takes a long time, even by the end of the book, only the seeds of deep change have been planted.

There's an excitement and an energy that comes from a big transformation, and that helps to create a habit.
